price: Ó sì sọ pé: “Ẹ kàn mú àwọn òrìṣà lẹ́yìn Allāhu, ní ohun tí ẹ nífẹ̀ẹ́ sí (láti jọ́sìn fún) láààrin ara yín nínú ìṣẹ̀mí ayé (yìí). Lẹ́yìn náà, ní Ọjọ́ Àjíǹde apá kan yin yóò tako apá kan. Apá kan yín yó sì ṣẹ́bi lé apá kan. Iná sì ni ibùgbé yín. Kò sì níí sí àwọn alárànṣe kan fún yín.”
arabic: وَقَالَ إِنَّمَا ٱتَّخَذۡتُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَوۡثَٰنٗا مَّوَدَّةَ بَيۡنِكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ ثُمَّ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ يَكۡفُرُ بَعۡضُكُم بِبَعۡضٖ وَيَلۡعَنُ بَعۡضُكُم بَعۡضٗا وَمَأۡوَىٰكُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن نَّٰصِرِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: waqāla innamā ittakhadhtum min dūni al-lahi awthānan mawaddata baynikum fī al-ḥayati al-dun'yā thumma yawma al-qiyāmati yakfuru baʿḍukum bibaʿḍin wayalʿanu baʿḍukum baʿḍan wamawākumu al-nāru wamā lakum min nāṣirīna
